body: Is that it???? I was hoping for more to the story. It basically ended right when it started to get interesting

Some other scumbag trained and abused her, so they fuck once and he takes over as the master. It seems more like they played out a fantasy, “hey, what if I was trained for sex” and they both went, “let’s pretend and make up the material and then you rescue me”
classic line ''you're not dirty at all'' those cucklords even would eat out a pussy that got fucked by 100 old mans while saying those lines. retard for once, retard for life.

Nice, comunication is needed for good relationship

This is pretty good. And so what about her background. MC’s got no right to say what she should and shouldn’t have done since he rejected her first. Now that they’re together, as long as they’re faithful and good to each other, and also happy, then it’s all good. I mean if she rejected him and he went around sleeping with women and then decided to get together after she confessed again like he did, then she wouldn’t have a right to say anything about his past either.

Wait, what? because she got rejected by him thus she looks for comfort from her home tutor by giving her virginity to him then she became his sex slave (they didn't became lovers), been trained to all sorts of sex plays, got impregnated by him but aborted it since tutor doesn't love her so he doesn't want to take responsibility, got dumped by him, has random sex with other guys in town to please herself then became lovers with her sissy childhood friend in the end but still can't live a proper life and still do roleplays thus her childhood friend lover is also her master? I'd say that it is a happy ending but still a crappy story regardless.
If it were me, I'd fuck her once and dump her.
Pixie cut is a tag? Huh
I expected more play from the guy, but just received vanilla
MC is an idiot so he'll have to take the consequences. Alright, pretty tame shit coming from Hoshino Ryuichi... like they always say "old but gold".
